data.lyric:
[ti:Tequila]
[ar:Dan   Shay]
[al:Tequila]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.10]Tequila - Dan + Shay (丹和吉文)
[00:00.20]
[00:00.71]Written by：Nicolle Galyon/Dan Smyers/Jordan Reynolds
[00:01.96]
[00:05.10]I can still shut down a party
[00:08.40]
[00:10.69]I can hang with anybody
[00:14.35]
[00:16.24]I can drink whiskey and red wine
[00:19.04]
[00:19.59]Champagne all night
[00:22.10]Little Scotch on the rocks and I'm fine I'm fine
[00:26.17]
[00:26.82]But when I taste tequila baby I still see ya
[00:31.68]Cutting up the floor in a sorority T-Shirt
[00:34.18]
[00:34.89]The same one you wore when we were
[00:37.15]
[00:37.75]Sky high in Colorado your lips pressed against the bottle
[00:42.92]Swearing on a Bible baby I'd never leave ya
[00:45.53]
[00:46.09]I remember how bad I need ya when I taste tequila
[00:51.24]
[00:54.76]When I taste tequila
[00:56.96]
[01:01.10]I can kiss somebody brand new and not even think about you
[01:10.13]
[01:12.02]I can show up to the same bar
[01:15.21]Hear the same songs in my car
[01:17.77]Baby your memory it only hits me this hard
[01:21.60]
[01:22.53]When I taste tequila baby I still see ya
[01:27.66]Cutting up the floor in a Serotta T-shirt
[01:29.80]
[01:30.66]The same one you wore when we were
[01:32.96]
[01:33.59]Sky high in Colorado your lips pressed against the bottle
[01:38.69]Swearing on a Bible baby I'd never leave ya
[01:41.28]
[01:41.88]I remember how bad I need ya when I taste Tequila
[01:46.87]
[01:50.59]When I taste Tequila
[01:52.77]
[02:08.75]I ain't even drunk I ain't even drunk
[02:10.69]And I'm thinking
[02:11.91]
[02:14.12]How I need your love how I need your love
[02:16.29]Yeah it sinks in
[02:17.63]
[02:18.25]When I taste tequila baby I still see ya
[02:23.34]
[02:24.55]Sorority T-shirt the same one you wore when we were
[02:29.40]Sky high in Colorado your lips pressed against the bottle
[02:34.53]Swearing on a Bible baby I'd never leave ya
[02:37.10]
[02:37.72]I remember how bad I need ya when I taste tequila
[02:42.62]
[02:46.41]When I taste tequila
[02:48.39]
[02:52.04]When I taste tequila
[02:54.11]
[02:57.64]When I taste tequila
data.trans:
[ti:Tequila]
[ar:Dan   Shay]
[al:Tequila]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.10]//
[00:00.20]
[00:00.71]//
[00:01.96]
[00:05.10]我仍然可以终止一场狂欢
[00:08.40]
[00:10.69]我可以和任何人寻欢作乐
[00:14.35]
[00:16.24]我可以畅饮红酒和威士忌
[00:19.04]
[00:19.59]彻夜沉浸在香槟里
[00:22.10]小酌一杯苏格兰威士忌 我一切安好 一切安好
[00:26.17]
[00:26.82]但是当我品尝着龙舌兰 宝贝 你仍然浮现在我脑海
[00:31.68]在联谊会上 进入舞池 纵情摇摆
[00:34.18]
[00:34.89]当我们相依相伴 你仍然一如从前
[00:37.15]
[00:37.75]在科罗拉多的晴空之下 你仍然沉浸在灯红酒绿之中
[00:42.92]宝贝 我对上帝发誓 我永远不会离你而去
[00:45.53]
[00:46.09]我记得当我品尝着龙舌兰 我有多么需要你
[00:51.24]
[00:54.76]当我品尝着龙舌兰
[00:56.96]
[01:01.10]我可以另寻新欢 甚至将你忘记
[01:10.13]
[01:12.02]我可以出现在同一个酒吧里
[01:15.21]在车里听着同样的旋律
[01:17.77]宝贝 有关你的记忆在我心里久久难以褪去
[01:21.60]
[01:22.53]当我品尝着龙舌兰 宝贝 你仍然浮现在我脑海
[01:27.66]在联谊会上 进入舞池 纵情摇摆
[01:29.80]
[01:30.66]当我们相依相伴 你仍然一如从前
[01:32.96]
[01:33.59]在科罗拉多的晴空之下 你仍然沉浸在灯红酒绿之中
[01:38.69]宝贝 我对上帝发誓 我永远不会离你而去
[01:41.28]
[01:41.88]我记得当我品尝着龙舌兰 我有多么需要你
[01:46.87]
[01:50.59]当我品尝着龙舌兰
[01:52.77]
[02:08.75]我甚至无法酩酊大醉 无法酩酊大醉
[02:10.69]我还在想着你
[02:11.91]
[02:14.12]我多么需要你的爱意 多么需要你的爱意
[02:16.29]我已彻底沉沦
[02:17.63]
[02:18.25]当我品尝着龙舌兰 宝贝 你仍然浮现在我脑海
[02:23.34]
[02:24.55]在联谊会上 当我们相依相伴 你仍然一如从前
[02:29.40]在科罗拉多的晴空之下 你仍然沉浸在灯红酒绿之中
[02:34.53]宝贝 我对上帝发誓 我永远不会离你而去
[02:37.10]
[02:37.72]我记得当我品尝着龙舌兰 我有多么需要你
[02:42.62]
[02:46.41]当我品尝着龙舌兰
[02:48.39]
[02:52.04]当我品尝着龙舌兰
[02:54.11]
[02:57.64]当我品尝着龙舌兰
